attributes.action: Reject any proposal or move granting amnesty to illegal immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilist recognising the contribution made my migrant workers it is necessary to draw a distinction between legal and illegal workers and uphold the laws of the United Kingdom regarding immigration. Any amnesty for Illegal workers would bypass the rule of law for a select group whilst applying in full to people with a genuine right to be in the UK.
